sen.e: TAIRA no Tokizane (1151 - February 21, 1213) was a Court noble in the late Heian Period and the early Kamakura Period.

sen.e: He was promoted from Sanuki no kuni no kami (Provincial Governor of Sanuki), Sakone no shosho (Minor Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards), to Shoshiinoge (Senior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade), Sakone no chujo (Middle Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards), but was dismissed from office following the exile from the capital of the Taira family.
